special_text:
[+1]: Until end of turn, Milos becomes a Orc Warrior creature with indestructible and power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him. [i](Damage won’t reduce his loyalty.)[/i]
[-2]: Mill two cards, then you may return a card from your graveyard to your hand.
Escape–{G}{G}, Exile X other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
